text: wala ttzwju -ayha almslmwn- almushrikat eabidat alawthan, hataa ydkhln fi al'islam. waelamuu 'ana aimra'at mmlwkt la mal laha wala hsb, mwmntan ballh, khayr min aimra'at mshrkt, wa'iin 'aejabatkum almshrkt alhr. wala tuzawwiju nisa'akum almuminat -'ima' 'aw hrayr- lilmushrikin hataa yuminuu biallah wrswlh. waelamuu 'ana ebdana mwmnana mae fqrh, khayr min mshrk, wa'iin 'aejabakum almshrk.
